item.title: House Amber
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: This is my favorite recipe. I have not made this in a year or so, but I am going to get a nice pipeline of this going again and dedicate a tap for it. Maybe I will make a special tap handle for it. This normally comes out to 6.3% abv House Amber American Amber Ale Type: All Grain Date: Batch Size (fermenter): 5.50 gal Boil Size: 7.04 gal Boil Time: 60 min Equipment: Pot and Cooler ( 5 Gal/40 L) - All Grain End of Boil Volume 6.
